column17:
Product Description

Isharya is a premium costume jewelry brand epitomizing modern Indian glamour. Inspired by India’s intricate and vibrant style Isharya blends modern techniques with heirloom details to create on trend high quality jewelry that is provocative and sophisticated yet available at accessible price points. The collection fuses a modern California chic aesthetic with the allure of Bollywood glamour for a truly global feel. Architectural angles and cheerful bursts of color bring Isharya’s Louvre collection to life. Inspired by the Musee du Louvre’s Pyramid in Paris each piece is designed to pay homage to the simplicity of the structure’s geometric peaks and clean lines. All outlined with 18 to 24k gold plating the Louvre collection highlights 3D surfaces with vibrant translucent and opaque resin in shades from tangerine to purple.

column17:
Product Description

Isharya is a premium costume jewelry brand epitomizing modern Indian glamour. Inspired by India’s intricate and vibrant style Isharya blends modern techniques with heirloom details to create on trend high quality jewelry that is provocative and sophisticated yet available at accessible price points. The collection fuses a modern California chic aesthetic with the allure of Bollywood glamour for a truly global feel. India’s love affair with jewelry sparked from the decadent troves of the famed maharajas. Isharya modernizes heritage Indian “polki” or “rose cut” diamond gold jewelry by using semi-cut facet mirrors set in 18k gold plated brass. Each unique piece is a must have presenting a glamorous statement in its own way. Make these baubles the perfect accessory to any wardrobe for a look that’s ready to hit the red carpet.
